CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

CHI turns and looks at INV

INV enters the room at 15:05:33 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 15:11:08 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit CHI on her lap at the table . INV gives CHI the beads to hold

CHI lets go of the beads

CHI holds out the necklace to the INV
INV takes the beads from CHI
CHI points to the object and looks at INV
INV puts the object in the drawer
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity and leaves the room
